description:
Get excited, "The Flash" and "Arrow" fans -- The CW is reportedly going for the DC universe trifecta. 《闪电侠》和绿箭侠的粉丝们可以激动起来了，因为CW电视台将会推出动漫三连击！

According to The Hollywood Reporter, the "Arrow" team of Greg Berlanti, Andrew Kreisberg and Marc Guggenhiem is working on a spinoff of The CW's popular superhero shows that would bring together "Arrow's" Ray Palmer/The Atom (Brandon Routh) and "The Flash's" Leonard Snart/Captain Cold (Wentworth Miller) and Dr. Martin Stein/Firestorm (Victor Garber). 据《好莱坞报道者》报道，《绿箭侠》剧组的Greg Berlanti、Andrew Kreisberg和Marc Guggenhiem正在为CW热门超级英雄美剧的衍生剧做筹备，这部衍生剧将会包括《绿箭侠》的Ray Palmer/原子侠和《闪电侠》的Leonard Snart/寒冷队长和Martin Stein博士/火风暴。

The show will reportedly also include Caity Lotz, despite her character of Sara Lance/Canary being killed off on "Arrow" this season -- there is no word yet as to whether they would revive the character somehow or Lotz would play a different character. 据报道，这部衍生剧还会有Caity Lotz来参演，虽然她的角色Sara Lance/Canary在《绿箭侠》这一季中已经被沙——目前还不知道她是在剧中扮演原来的角色，还是会出演一个全新的角色。
